headline.print_headline: BOJ's Kuroda Says Easy Monetary Policy Achieving Intended Results
headline.main: BOJ's Kuroda Says Easy Monetary Policy Achieving Intended Results

docs.snippet: Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Saturday a massive stimulus policy introduced a year ago had achieved its goal of boosting the real economy, lifting growth and ending deflation but said a 2 percent inflation of two years could take ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Saturday a massive stimulus policy introduced a year ago had achieved its goal of boosting the real economy, lifting growth and ending deflation but said a 2 percent inflation of two years could take more time to achieve.

headline.main: Behind the 'Slightly-Better-Than-a-Dartboard Guide to Choosing a Team'

docs.snippet: In the World Cup, you can choose to root for your ancestors or, if you want, a team that speaks to you, and not your patriotic pride. If that’s your chosen course, this is a chart for you....
docs.abstract: In the World Cup, you can choose to root for your ancestors or, if you want, a team that speaks to you, and not your patriotic pride. If that’s your chosen course, this is a chart for you.

headline.print_headline: Braehmer Outpoints Bolonti to Retain WBA Belt
headline.main: Braehmer Outpoints Bolonti to Retain WBA Belt

docs.snippet: Juergen Braehmer of Germany unanimously outpointed Roberto Feliciano Bolonti of Argentina to retain his WBA light heavyweight belt on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Juergen Braehmer of Germany unanimously outpointed Roberto Feliciano Bolonti of Argentina to retain his WBA light heavyweight belt on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: New Allegations of Corruption in 2022 Cup Vote
headline.main: New Allegations of Corruption in 2022 Cup Vote

docs.snippet: FIFA's decision to award the 2022 World Cup to Qatar came under further scrutiny as a British newspaper published new allegations that Mohamed Bin Hammam used his wealth and top level contacts to buy support for the oil-rich country's successful b...
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA's decision to award the 2022 World Cup to Qatar came under further scrutiny as a British newspaper published new allegations that Mohamed Bin Hammam used his wealth and top level contacts to buy support for the oil-rich country's successful bid.

headline.print_headline: Jason Millard Disqualified From US Open
headline.main: Jason Millard Disqualified From US Open

docs.snippet: Jason Millard was disqualified from the U.S. Open on Saturday after reporting a self-imposed penalty for grounding his club in a bunker in sectional qualifying....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jason Millard was disqualified from the U.S. Open on Saturday after reporting a self-imposed penalty for grounding his club in a bunker in sectional qualifying.

headline.print_headline: Heat Look to Bounce Back Against Spurs and Keep Streak Going
headline.main: Heat Look to Bounce Back Against Spurs and Keep Streak Going

docs.snippet: The Miami Heat have won 12 straight playoff games following a loss, a streak they will need to keep alive on Sunday to avoid going into an ominous 0-2 hole against the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA Finals....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Miami Heat have won 12 straight playoff games following a loss, a streak they will need to keep alive on Sunday to avoid going into an ominous 0-2 hole against the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA Finals.

headline.print_headline: More Than 1,300 Fans Notified of Ticket Changes
headline.main: More Than 1,300 Fans Notified of Ticket Changes

docs.snippet: FIFA says about 1,400 people will have to change their tickets less than a week before the World Cup begins because they were handed out before work at the stadiums was completed....
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA says about 1,400 people will have to change their tickets less than a week before the World Cup begins because they were handed out before work at the stadiums was completed.

headline.print_headline: Truck Driver Charged in Crash That Killed Comedian, Injured Comic Tracy Morgan
headline.main: Truck Driver Charged in Crash That Killed Comedian, Injured Comic Tracy Morgan

docs.snippet: A truck driver from Georgia was charged on Saturday with causing a crash between his semi-trailer and a van that killed a comedian and critically injured comic actor Tracy Morgan, U.S. prosecutors said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A truck driver from Georgia was charged on Saturday with causing a crash between his semi-trailer and a van that killed a comedian and critically injured comic actor Tracy Morgan, U.S. prosecutors said.

headline.print_headline: Mayor: Rio Will Fail to Keep Pledge to Clean Bay
headline.main: Mayor: Rio Will Fail to Keep Pledge to Clean Bay

docs.snippet: Rio de Janeiro will not keep its promise of cleaning polluted Guanabara Bay for the 2016 Olympics, Mayor Eduardo Paes said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rio de Janeiro will not keep its promise of cleaning polluted Guanabara Bay for the 2016 Olympics, Mayor Eduardo Paes said on Saturday.
